tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  material_url TEXT,
  created_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CourseFiles (
  file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  file_name VARCHAR(255),
  file_type VARCHAR(50),
  file_path TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES CourseMaterials(course_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Course (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255), instructor VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Material (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(255), file_type VARCHAR(50), course_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));
CREATE TABLE Topic (topic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, topic_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, course_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));
CREATE TABLE Assignment (assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assignment_name VARCHAR(255), deadline TIMESTAMP, course_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));
